content: MELBOURNE  Feb 25 Canada's Franco-Nevada Corp  chief said on Thursday the company does not see the high rate of return it is set to reap from a recent $500 million gold and silver "streaming" deal with Glencore Plc as a benchmark for future deals.
name: Franco-Nevada Corporation
title: Franco-Nevada values long-term gain over fat returns in streaming deals

content: TORONTO  Feb 10 Toronto-based Franco-Nevada  has agreed to acquire a precious metal stream in southern Peru from Glencore for $500 million and arranged a $550 million financing to fund the deal  it said on Wednesday.
name: Franco-Nevada Corporation
title: Franco-Nevada to buy Glencore precious metals stream for $500 million

content: * Long-term streaming agreement has been entered into by Narila Investments with Franco-Nevada
name: Franco-Nevada Corporation
title: BRIEF-Glencore says signs streaming agreement with Franco-Nevada

content: Oct 7 Franco-Nevada Corp said it agreed to pay Teck Resources Ltd $610 million to help fund operations at the Antamina mine in Peru in exchange for a share of silver production.
name: Franco-Nevada Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Franco-Nevada  Teck Resources reach streaming deal for Antamina mine

content: Oct 5 First Quantum Minerals Ltd   said it has revised its deal with Franco-Nevada Corp  for its flagship copper-gold Cobre Panama project in Central America after reviewing the costs.
name: Franco-Nevada Corporation
title: First Quantum Minerals revises deal with Franco-Nevada

content: Oct 7 Franco-Nevada Corp reached a silver streaming agreement with miner Teck Resources Ltd  for $610 million.
name: Franco-Nevada Corporation
title: Franco-Nevada  Teck Resources sign silver streaming deal

content: TORONTO  Sept 16 Glencore is in talks with Franco-Nevada Corp  Silver Wheaton Corp  Royal Gold Inc and two other companies to sell portions of the future production of three South American copper mines  two sources with knowledge of the talks said.
name: Franco-Nevada Corporation
title: Glencore in talks on streaming deals on Chile  Peru mines -sources

content: TORONTO  March 23 Canadian miner Noront Resources Ltd said on Monday that it would buy Cliffs Natural Resources Inc's chromite assets in the northern Ontario Ring of Fire district for $20 million  financed by a loan from Franco-Nevada Corp.
name: Franco-Nevada Corporation
title: Cliffs to sell Ring of Fire assets to Noront
